website_summaries.verdict: There's no denying the Pixel 4 XL has one of the best cameras around, but its shortcomings don't justify its high price. Instead, consider the Note 10 or the OnePlus 7T. The Pixel 3 XL is another great candidate and is discounted at $600 now.
pros: The Pixel 4 XL has a big screen that refreshes 90 times a second, so everything looks real smooth
It also takes outstanding photos, and its face unlock is the fastest we've seen
cons: The phone is expensive, doesn't come with earbuds and has no expandable storage option

customer_reviews.title: Miss the Fingerprint Reader
customer_reviews.text: Face unlock is annoying. I miss the fingerprint reader. I miss the software buttons at the bottom of the screen. Camera is nice, but so was my Pixel 3XL's camera. Battery life is atrocious. Can't wait for the class action.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua J. Mullin

customer_reviews.title: Beyond my expectations
customer_reviews.text: I only purchased this phone to enjoy the great camers that everyone praised. Camera is definitely amazing and I can say that it takes good pictures everytime in all scenarios. What I didn't expect to be good in this phone was battery life but this phone actually has pretty good battery life. On average it's lasting 6 hours of screen on time as I watch Youtube videos on my free time and still managed to give me sufficient more battery. Lastly, this phone is really snappy and smooth. Like damn! Reeeeeally quick app opening and everything, you will love the 90Hz screen as you use it.
customer_reviews.author: Yocer

customer_reviews.title: Not a good buy
customer_reviews.text: This phone was supposed to be a new phone but I discovered it is not entirely a new phone like it was stated in the receipt of purchase. The phone accessories where not complete suggesting that it has been used or tampered with. The phone ear piece and charging plug wasn't contained in the package. I have already set up the phone. This is the only time I have to make such remark
customer_reviews.author: Victor Amadi

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price and the hype
customer_reviews.text: While I have had all the Pixel phone before this one, this was such a disappointing upgrade. The price I paid for was not worth the phone I got. Face recognition was good for unlocking the phone but most of the all the apps dont support this on Google. Battery is absolutely terrible. It is supposed to have a bigger battery then the 3xl but it felt that it was weaker. The Pixel 3xl is still the best out of the Pixel family and I was so disappointed by the 4xl that I had to return it. Very bad upgrade on googles part.
customer_reviews.author: Rodrigo Fuentes

customer_reviews.title: Overall best smart phone in the planet.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best smart phone to date. It's so smooth and fast. fantastic camera and the built is very solid. I love the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Messiah

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Cell Reception.
customer_reviews.text: Overall this is a pretty nice phone. Unfortunately Cellular Reception is not good. I get about 1 less bar than my old phone (moto z4) This means I'm unable to talk on the phone in parts of my house where I could before. Also the phone speaker is really terrible. You almost have to use a Bluetooth headset to talk to folks. It's also HEAVY, like a brick. I no longer have to do upper body workouts because I carried this heavy thing around. I didn't have any issue with battery life, ending the day with ~30%. It has to be returned because of the terrible cell reception. Oh the camera is FANTASTIC.
customer_reviews.author: Xaidin

customer_reviews.title: Better than my Galaxy s8 active
customer_reviews.text: Phone feels really smooth and nice in your hand, the camera is amazing, battery life is really good (recommend turning off motion sense and always on display) the operating system runs smoothly. I'm especially a fan of the auto correct I've always had problems with it in the past on iPhones but it performs flawlessly on the pixel. The Google assistant is light-years ahead of bixby and Cortana
customer_reviews.author: owen

customer_reviews.title: No storage and terrible battery life
customer_reviews.text: There is no fingerprint reader, no SD card slot, very limited storage and the phone is always unlocking on its own due to the overly eager face recognition. The camera is fabulous, though. Much better than the Samsung S20 Ultra.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Discount 2 days after purchase
customer_reviews.text: Really nice phone which I am very happy with. Just not satisfied about buying this phone for 799$ only to find out 2 days later it got discounted to 649$ with no possibility of any kind of compensation. A little disappointed on that front unfortunately...
customer_reviews.author: Emil

customer_reviews.title: Do your research
customer_reviews.text: There are lots of glitches with this phone. Sometimes during calls the other person on the other line can't hear me and I have to talk louder than normal. WhatsApp video calls are high in static and the noise is amplified so even the rustling of paper sounds loud and annoying. I regret getting this phone! :/ You need extra converters or cords if you don't have Bluetooth connection in your car. No aux port. I should have done my research!
customer_reviews.author: Urvi Patel

customer_reviews.title: It's fine.
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded from Pixel 2XL to 4XL.... it's a solid phone, but honestly not much different. Love the clean version of Android without all the carrier bloatware though!
customer_reviews.author: Craig Thorness

customer_reviews.title: Phone shot bad video, bricked after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: I got this phone because I was told it had an amazing camera and I need that for filming. Turns out its just software and the actual camera is kind of trash so while pictures are fine video is worse than my 10 year old phone!!!! I also am wrting this today because i was seeing if I could get tech support because it just bricked. I have only had it for 3 month and it just breaks while i'm browsing twitter in bed. All around pile of junk. I feel scammed given what i paid!
customer_reviews.author: Rayne

customer_reviews.title: Camera, Google Assistant, overall experience well worth the moderate price
customer_reviews.text: No finger print reader is a bummer, battery is ok but could be better, Other than above mentioned, completely satisfied. Would buy again !
customer_reviews.author: real, uncompensated person

customer_reviews.title: Worst phone I've ever purchased!!!
customer_reviews.text: This phone has never lived up to my expectations. It's slow, the battery life sucks... And now that it won't hold the charge the repair process is absolutely the worst!! The repair company for walk-in service is downright inept saying there was water damage in the phone when it has never been remotely near water except for rain. I hated this phone when it worked and will never purchase another Google product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Santee

customer_reviews.title: Amazon handles shipping better than Google
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a Pixel 4 directly from Google with an estimated shipping of 1-2 weeks. After a month, I still hadn't received anything. I ordered the same Pixel 4 from Amazon and I received it in 2 days. I highly recommend purchasing this phone from Amazon instead of Google. You'll receive the same exact phone, with much better customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Quality phone
customer_reviews.text: I keep it locked at 90Hz and it lasts the whole day. Plenty of great features, but nothing that gets in the way of using the phone. I use it for reading and browsing mostly and the image quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: Cam

customer_reviews.title: Best Phone Yet
customer_reviews.text: There is not a fingerprint scanner advertised, but I assumed a new smartphone would have one... Just so you're aware. It is a GREAT product. This is by far the best phone I ever ever owned. The nighttime camera is spectacular. Everything feels smooth. The design is basically flawless. I've had no issues with battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra

customer_reviews.title: The Phone To Get For The Perfect Android and Picture Experience
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used Google phones since the Nexus 5. My last phone before this was the Pixel 3 which had great software but terrible battery life. The Pixel 4 XL isn’t perfect and launched terribly overpriced - but being able to snag it on a holiday price helped - the software experience is unbeatable and getting an XL provided a battery boost. Recommended ONLY when on sale because this phone should be a default $700 at most.
customer_reviews.author: Oje

customer_reviews.title: Don’t listen to those fanboys!
customer_reviews.text: This phone is very smooth, very confortable in the hand, very good battery life! Don’t listen to those fanboys about battery life is bad, if you don’t live and breathe with your phone 24/7, the battery life is very good and the face unlock works flawless! $600 for this device, it’s definitely the best bang for your bucks!
customer_reviews.author: Delraks Mishalska

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this product - The hardware is unreliable
customer_reviews.text: In the middle of Aug 2020, when I received last OS update , the wifi started acting weird and the device wasn't able to connect to any access point. I feel I had been sold a bad hardware at the cost of new and genuine hardware. This is cheating. I should be mindful of buying any hardware from amazon next time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Camera quality is amazing, screen, speakers all wonderful. Goes from 100% to about 30% in a day of decent use (podcasts, etc).
customer_reviews.author: AdventChildVII

customer_reviews.title: Great camera 👍
customer_reviews.text: Love the camera, good as the new iPhones, battery lasts all day no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda R

customer_reviews.title: Goes to Mute as you a speaking to someone.
customer_reviews.text: Very unhappy w/this phone...When I'm speaking to someone, it goes to Mute all by it's self for no apparent reason...I had a Pixel 2 & it never had that problem...I would not buy this phone.
customer_reviews.author: SANDRA FRYE

customer_reviews.title: Great phone... When purchased with a discount
customer_reviews.text: The phone is fine, you can hardly notice the top bezel however it really needs the fingerprint reader I have to keep taking of the mask. The soli radar doesn't work on Latin amera BTW
customer_reviews.author: Samir Dubois

customer_reviews.title: European version
customer_reviews.text: I received it very fast and sealed box 100% new unit.... But it's an european version with european charger, totally useless in america
customer_reviews.author: Leonardo Baez

customer_reviews.title: After 3 Months Speakers Don't Work
customer_reviews.text: I bought a double-protection case in order to have a complete protection of the phone and 3 months later bottom speakers just died. The left one is totally dead and the right one has maintained a very weak sound. Only upper speaker works. Very much frustrated.
customer_reviews.author: Zurriuss

customer_reviews.title: Great mobile phone with fantastic camera
customer_reviews.text: Pixel 4XL is a great mobile phone that probably has market-leading camera technology. So far (one month of ownership), I have not experiences any problems with functions or apps. As a European citizen, I am sorry that i still cannot buy Pixel mobile phones in Denmark.
customer_reviews.author: Niels O G Jorgensen

customer_reviews.title: Expensive phone with sleek design, face lock only, good camera and no additional SD card storage
customer_reviews.text: There is no fingerprint scanner.. it has face recognition, it works well. Battery life is not best based on one week usage. Will use it for a month and then provide feedback.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bargain from Amazon Warehouse
customer_reviews.text: Almost half the price of a new one. It looks brand new, no marks or scratches. Excellent purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy moving from Pixel 2 to 4xl
customer_reviews.text: I love the raw Android experience. I expect the battery to only be ok. The facial recognition is fun and works well, but I miss the finger print id.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic phone, no need to get anything else.
customer_reviews.text: Great phone, very fast/responsive, great screen and a fantastic camera. This is my 3rd Pixel and they keep getting better.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander J. Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Great phone, super fast.
customer_reviews.text: Face recognition is very fast, camera options are awesome, and battery life has been excellent (easily 2 days with normal use). If Google had added expandable memory, it would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: bobwat34

customer_reviews.title: It's good phone!
customer_reviews.text: It's a really good phone. The only con I could tell ks that battery life is average. My first one came with battery issues. it wouldn't last half a day. With the replacement I can survive with a single charge with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo

customer_reviews.title: Send phone pleeeeease and hentai
customer_reviews.text: I can finally record my midget porn in high def. Also please send me another phone for free or at 75% off please.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone
customer_reviews.text: Great screen and camera! User interface and motion controls a little hard to get used to but are great when you do.
customer_reviews.author: James White

customer_reviews.title: Phone is great price and arrived in less than 24 hours.
customer_reviews.text: I got this Google Pixel 4a xl to replace my husband’s 3a. Google has surpassed what I thought to be a great phone in the 3a xl. They are definitely playing with the big league (iPhone and Samsung) with all the newest technology. And the price! Love this phone!
customer_reviews.author: Sherri C

customer_reviews.title: I was a google fan
customer_reviews.text: Bought this black friday last year. Last week the front camera ceased to exist and face unlock was already shotty. Google wants me to put an 800 dollar hold on my credit card until I ship the faulty phone in all for a refurbished phone.
customer_reviews.author: D. Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: Useful upgrade from Pixel 3
customer_reviews.text: Probably the best phone I've ever had. The screen is excellent, but there are quality of life improvements across the board from the pixel 3. At the price I picked this up from Amazon warehouse for? Easily one of my best phone purchases.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Expected better phone but anyway it's normal. Phone does not has back key, fingerprint and down side three marks. Also expected better camera.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone. Huge upgrade from my Honor 7X. Battery life is good, sound is up to par with what I want, the screen and face reader work very well. Overall, very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Amazing device
customer_reviews.text: Amazing device, don’t know why there was so much hate from the Tech reviewers. Battery life it great, screen is amazing with the 90Hz refresh rate and the software is so clean and intuitive
customer_reviews.author: CB2

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Love this phone, everything works as it should. Very pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Barry Moodie

customer_reviews.title: It's nice.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent phone. The design is almost perfect. My only complaint is I wish the hardware was made of stainless steel. Bring this to the table and it would be absolute favorite phone ever.
customer_reviews.author: Katlyn W.

customer_reviews.title: Good phone, go for the 128 GB version
customer_reviews.text: This product was a present for my girlfriend. One issue I had with the device was that the screen went black once my girlfriend was setting up the phone with her apps
customer_reviews.author: Emanuel Berrospe

customer_reviews.title: good OLED screen
customer_reviews.text: motionsense works well. face unlock is also good. But when I use fast wireless charger, It works with normal speed. I should buy Qi EPP certified charger, not a normal Qi charger..
customer_reviews.author: wonhyun

customer_reviews.title: Good phone but most apps don't support face id on Android
customer_reviews.text: Good phone but most apps don't support face id on Android. Plus there were scratches on the phone out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: RD

customer_reviews.title: Best Android experience.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first Google Pixel phone. I must say, there is nothing like using stock pure Android directly from the source.
customer_reviews.author: Taysir Shash

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: This is a great phone. But it does quickly and has to be charged often.
customer_reviews.author: jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: Camera is disappointing
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the camera is not at all comparable with iPhone Xs. was expecting at least 90% match with it.
customer_reviews.author: HR

customer_reviews.title: Phone
customer_reviews.text: Was hesitant buying a phone on Amazon. But love it! Came in a nice package & charger.
customer_reviews.author: Carolina

customer_reviews.title: Starts up fast,very responsive,great camera runs cool.
customer_reviews.text: Very fast and responsive phone. Wouldn't trade it for any other phone out there. Definitely a flagship phone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Google phone that was overpriced when released
customer_reviews.text: Alright for what the price was during sales, you buy it for what Google offers in software
customer_reviews.author: Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Phone
customer_reviews.text: Love the phone and I like Amazon, plus the company got it out pretty quick
customer_reviews.author: Adonis AIA

customer_reviews.title: Smooth!
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Just upgraded from a Pixel 1. Everything works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Oti Mesz

customer_reviews.title: Pixel > iPhone
customer_reviews.text: Pixel 4 XL, the best phone I've ever had or seen
customer_reviews.author: Hydro Mamba

customer_reviews.title: Google nut
customer_reviews.text: I've been purchasing the Pixel since the beginning. Initially I didn't like the fact that there was no fingerprint scanner. However the facial scanner works great for logging into my mobile bank apps. Currently as a light to medium cell user, the battery seems to be a disappointment. Camera is great as always. There is no BACK, or HOME button. After a little practice it's pretty easy to swipe up for HOME, or slide to the left to go back. Just took some time to grow accustomed to it . NOt my favorite Pixel yet, but time will tell
customer_reviews.author: Terry BTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Stay with pixel 3 or buy this if it is a big upgrade
customer_reviews.text: I hate the lack of finger print reader because most banking apps don't have face reader ability yet for Android. The battery leaves a lot to be desired. That being said, the camera on this thing is awesome! I cannot believe how amazing it is. I am upgrading from an LG G6 so going to this puppy is a big upgrade. The screen is stunning and the processor is speedy. I would recommend but it might not be such an upgrade for the pixel 3 users.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Huge upgrade!!
customer_reviews.text: My original Pixel XL finally kicked the bucket a little while ago, and I felt like it was time for a serious upgrade. The Pixel 4 XL is better in every way than the original Pixel. It has face recognition, which I think is easier than fingerprint reader. It has incredible battery life (I've gone a week without charging it!), a huge screen, and a crazy high quality camera. I really like the night photo mode, photos come out brighter and higher quality than they would with flash. Overall a great phone, though I would recommend waiting for a sale because it's pretty expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary DeLaney

customer_reviews.title: Phone is pretty good, battery life is not great, but warranty service is AWEFUL
customer_reviews.text: The phone is pretty good. The battery life is not great compared to my Samsung S9 previously. I ended up with a glitch in the phone causing the battery sensor to display 50% no matter what. To warranty replace the phone, Google wants me to send the phone to them and then they will send out the replacement. I woudl be without a phone for 7-10 days!! That is ridiculous!!! Going back to a Samsung.
customer_reviews.author: Average Joe 79

customer_reviews.title: Bought from Reputation
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit weary to buy a Google Phone due to privacy more than anything. But the cameras are the best feature for sure. Battery is just okay, nothing impressive. No SDcard slot is a negative for sure. I personally think this phone is really good but not great, except the camera. If camera is your number one thing, get it! If pictures are not high on your list, get a phone with more storage.
customer_reviews.author: GuardianMaster

customer_reviews.title: XLs larger battery makes it through a day of normal use and 64 gb adequate for the average user.
customer_reviews.text: Great camera, facial recognition very convenient and even works in the dark, battery life of the XL is adequate for my normal daily use, love Android 10 and the quick updates. I'm very happy with this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Michael R. Noel

customer_reviews.title: Nice phone.
customer_reviews.text: A very good phone, with stock Android. Was really hoping it could schedule appointments for me like they said Google Assistant would do in the future, but I guess we're not there yet. Face unlock works pretty good, but feel it'll start lagging in a year or two. I also dislike how face unlock works if the person's eyes are closed.
customer_reviews.author: Russell

customer_reviews.title: Mic quality is poor
customer_reviews.text: When I answer or make calls with speaker, persons are unable to hear me clearly
customer_reviews.author: ynolde

customer_reviews.title: Google support us Cox of 1995
customer_reviews.text: Sarcastic and condescending support staff that strive to divert and point fingers above all else. Will never buy another product directly through Google store.
customer_reviews.author: John Read

customer_reviews.title: Awesome phone
customer_reviews.text: I love the phone so far. Battery lasts 2+ days with moderate use. I will miss the fingerprint sensor but it's not a deal breaker. I upgraded from a Pixel 2 and I notice a difference in responsiveness and love the high refresh rate screen. Great phone
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Murby

customer_reviews.title: Cannot cast to non-google smart screens/devices, Chromecast only.
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed to find out that the casting feature only works with Chromecast. I have LG and Samsung smart TVs and a 4k fire stick that all allow casting from apple devices, laptops and other androids. Google has chosen to lockdown this feature on the Pixel. :( Other than that, the phone has decent battery life, feels sturdy, facial recognition works quickly and the phone respond quickly when switching between apps.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: I am upgrading from a Google Pixel 2 XL and like the 4 XL a lot more. The battery life is significantly better. Face unlock works even in the dark, and works better than the fingerprint, although not all apps support it yet. The camera and screen are better as well.
customer_reviews.author: Scott K

customer_reviews.title: Missing fingerprint scanner
customer_reviews.text: Got rid of the fingerprint reader and only allows for one face to unlock. This is going to be a tough transition as the finger was handy as I don't always want to put my phone to my face, like when I am driving. Other than that the phone is fine. I wish I had gone with the earlier generation though which is just as powerful but with the fingerprint reader.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone!
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded from the original Pixel XL. Way better battery life, faster, and exactly what I expected from research. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Robert M Gaffigan

customer_reviews.title: Great new phone
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my fiance during the Black Friday sale. Got a sweet deal. The Pixel series from google never disappoints.
customer_reviews.author: Wildcat2019

customer_reviews.title: So much better than IPhone
customer_reviews.text: I switched to Pixel from Iphone about 2 years ago and with each phone Google puts out, I'm just more and more impressed. The camera on this thing rivals professional ones.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Porter

customer_reviews.title: stopped working after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: Loved this phone for a few weeks but it started acting up and screen going black and now it won't turn on at all.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Brand new sealed in a box unlocked very quick to set up excellent price
customer_reviews.author: Bill Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Bring back the fingerprint reader!
customer_reviews.text: I miss the fingerprint reader of my old Pixel. Facial recognition is pretty weak authentication. Otherwise this is a good phone.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Dahl

product_meta.title: Google Pixel 4 XL - Just Black - 64GB - Unlocked
product_meta.description:
Style:Pixel 4 XL| Size:64GB| Color:Just Black| Configuration:Phone OnlyPixel 4 is the phone Made the Google way. So it’s built around the helpful Google software you know and love, that’s always getting better.

1. See G.Co/Pixel/astrophotography to Learn more about astrophotography on Pixel 4.

2. Us only. English only. 

3. Coming soon to Japan. Motion sense functional in the us, Canada, Singapore, Australia, Taiwan, and most European countries. Not all phone features are controlled by motion sense.

4. Us & Canada only. English only.

5. Approximate battery life based on a mix of talk, data, standby, mobile Hot spot and use of other features, with motion sense off and always on display off. Use of motion sense, an Active display or data usage will decrease battery life. Pixel 4 and 4 XL testing conducted in Mountain View, California in August 2019 on pre-production hardware and software. Actual results may vary.

6. Up to 10 W with Pixel 4 and Pixel 4 XL charging with Pixel Stand (SOLD Separately). actual results may vary.

7. Support nano SIM and eSIM (carrier dependent); Supports only usb type-c headphone Jack & bluetooth connections; Does not Support Expandable storage.
feature_bullets: Point and shoot for the perfect photo. Capture brilliant color and control the exposure balance of different parts of your photos.
Get the shot without the flash. Night Sight is now faster and easier to use it can even take photos of the Milky Way.
Get more done with your voice. The new Google Assistant is the easiest way to send texts, share photos, and more. [1]
A new way to control your phone. Quick Gestures let you skip songs and silence calls – just by waving your hand above the screen. [2]
End the robocalls. With Call Screen, the Google Assistant helps you proactively filter our spam before your phone ever rings. [3]

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars367 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
